tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_case_law (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_date DATE,
    legal_arguments JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_date DATE,
    case_language VARCHAR(50),
    case_body TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE case_law_support (
  support_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  argument_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case_law(case_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (argument_id) REFERENCES legal_arguments(argument_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cases ( 
 case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 case_name VARCHAR(255), 
 case_type VARCHAR(50), 
 court_name VARCHAR(100), 
 court_location VARCHAR(100), 
 filed_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE case_law_relationship ( 
 relation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 case_id UUID, 
 law_id UUID, 
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES cases (case_id), 
 FOREIGN KEY (law_id) REFERENCES case_law (law_id) 
);
